Introduction¶

Welcome to the world of Mastercoin.

This guide will walk you through the process of setting up, installing and running the Mastercoin-tools.

Consensus¶

A quick note on Consensus.

The official mastercoin state is defined by mastercoin-tools code result.

Periodically checking the consensus on the Masterchain Consensus Report can alert on potential differences among the implimentations.

Installed Items¶

Here is a breakdown of everything that is needed/installed to support Mastercoin-tools

  • git
  • make
  • python-simplejson
  • python-git
  • python-pip
    • ecdsa==0.10
    • pycoin==0.25
    • pybitcointools==1.1
  • git
  • build-essential
  • autoconf
  • libtool
  • libboost-all-dev
  • pkg-config
  • libcurl4-openssl-dev
  • libleveldb-dev
  • libzmq-dev
  • libconfig++-dev
  • libncurses5-dev
  • sx (d9b566e)
  • obelisk (4962e2c)
  • libbitcoin (4962e2c)
  • libwallet (4962e2c)
  • mastercoin-tools
